body.p: Mr Yamada agrees with the Board’s view in paragraph BC70 that immediate recognition of all changes in the fair values of plan assets and in the defined benefit obligation in the period in which those changes occur provides information that is more relevant to users of financial statements than the information provided by deferred recognition. Mr Yamada also agrees that immediate recognition provides a more faithful representation of defined benefit plans and is easier for a user to understand.
